sentences.en: All this has created considerable ill-will towards the armed forces.
sentences.cn: 所有这些都让人们对武装力量产生了相当深的怨恨。

sentences.en: Finally, late in life and against considerable odds, she became a nun.
sentences.cn: 她排除极大困难，最终在晚年成为了一名修女。

sentences.en: He brought to the job not just considerable experience but passionate enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他不仅给这一工作带来了不少经验，而且倾注了极大的热情。

sentences.en: He's shown considerable delicacy and tact in feeling the public mood.
sentences.cn: 他在体察民情方面表现得相当周到和练达。

sentences.en: I have spent a fairly considerable portion of my life here.
sentences.cn: 我生命中相当长的一段时光是在这里度过的。

sentences.en: Michael has already spent considerable time in Barcelona.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔在巴塞罗那已经待了相当长的时间了。

sentences.en: Quite a considerable number of interviews are going on.
Senator Kerry carries considerable weight in Washington.
sentences.cn: 参议员克里在华盛顿举足轻重。

sentences.en: Shares and bonds can bring one quite a considerable additional income.
sentences.cn: 股票和债券能给人带来不菲的额外收入。

sentences.en: The argument seemed to have considerable merit.
sentences.cn: 这个论点似乎颇有价值。

sentences.en: The film met with considerable critical and public acclaim.
sentences.cn: 该影片受到了影评人和公众的高度评价。

sentences.en: The series has aroused considerable interest.
sentences.cn: 这套系列节目引起了观众相当浓厚的兴趣。

sentences.en: The volume of gas trapped on these surfaces can be considerable.
sentences.cn: 存留在这些表面的气体体积可能相当大。

sentences.en: There was considerable scepticism about the Chancellor's forecast of a booming economy.
sentences.cn: 有相当多的人对财政大臣作出的经济会迅猛发展的预测表示怀疑。

sentences.en: This brought considerable relief from the pain.
sentences.cn: 这相当大地缓解了疼痛。

sentences.en: Vets' fees can be considerable, even for routine visits.
sentences.cn: 即使是常规检查，兽医的收费也会相当高。

sentences.en: What'simpressed me has been his considerable firmness of purpose.
sentences.cn: 令我印象深刻的是他对目标的坚定不移。

words.tran_cn: 经过深思熟虑的；被尊重的

trans.tran_en: fairly large, especially large enough to have an effect or be important
